translations: （使）参军，（使）入伍；争取，谋取；赞助，支持

sentences.sentence: They hoped to enlist the help of the public in solving the crime.
sentences.translation: 他们希望寻求公众协助破案。

sentences.sentence: If the bailiff thinks that things could turn nasty he will enlist the help of the police.
sentences.translation: 如果司法官认为情况可能会变糟，他会寻求警方帮助。

sentences.sentence: I had to cut down a tree and enlist the help of seven neighbours to get it out of the garden!
sentences.translation: 我不得不砍了一棵树，然后找了7位邻居帮忙把它从院子里弄出去。
